title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water according to the package instructions until al dente.
In a pan, heat a little olive oil and cook the pancetta or bacon until crispy.
If using garlic, add it to the pan with the pancetta and cook for 1 minute, then remove and discard the garlic.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and grated cheese.
Drain the spaghetti and quickly toss it in the pan with the pancetta to combine.
Remove the pan from the heat and quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture to create a creamy sauce. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper if desired.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Heat oil in a pan and cook the onions until soft and golden.
Add garlic and ginger, cooking for an additional 1 minute.
Add the marinated chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in the diced tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes.
Add the cream and simmer until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is thickened.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian dish of sautéed pieces of beef served in a sauce with smetana (sour cream).
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté the onions and garlic until translucent.
Add the beef and cook until browned.
Stir in the mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture.
Sprinkle the flour over the mixture and cook for 1 minute.
Gradually add the beef broth, stirring constantly until the sauce thickens.
Stir in the sour cream and heat through. Do not boil.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley, and serve with rice or noodles.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A stir-fried rice noodle dish commonly served as street food in Thailand.
ingredients: 200g chicken or shrimp, peeled and deveined
Crushed peanuts and lime wedges for garnish
instructions: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions and set aside.
Heat oil in a pan and cook the garlic, chicken or shrimp until fully cooked.
Push the meat to one side of the pan and scramble the eggs on the other side.
Add the cooked noodles, bean sprouts, carrots, and green onions to the pan.
Stir in fish sauce, soy sauce, tamarind paste, and sugar. Toss everything to combine.
Cook for a few more minutes until everything is heated through.
Serve with crushed peanuts and lime wedges on the side.

title: Sushi
summary: A Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice accompanied by various ingredients such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.
ingredients: Fresh fish or seafood (tuna, salmon, etc.)
Wasabi and pickled ginger for serving
instructions: Rinse the sushi rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
Cook the rice in a rice cooker or pot with the water.
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt in a bowl until dissolved and stir into the cooked rice.
Let the rice cool to room temperature.
Lay out a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat and spread an even layer of rice over it.
Arrange fish and vegetables in a line at one edge of the rice.
Roll the sushi tightly using the mat, then slice into bite-sized pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

title: Tacos
summary: A traditional Mexican dish consisting of a small hand-sized corn or wheat tortilla topped with a filling.
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
instructions: Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook the onions and garlic until soft.
Add the ground beef or chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in taco seasoning and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Warm the tortillas in a pan or microwave.
Fill each tortilla with the meat mixture, then top with lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
Serve with sour cream and salsa on the side.
